member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Reports.Parser.AwReportTest.moveNextRowTest
member.summary: Tests the MoveNext function. The provided report only has 4 rows, but this test tries to move to next row 10 times, however only 4 of those calls must return true.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Reports.Parser.AwReportTest.getFaultyRowsTest
member.summary: Tests getting all the rows of the faulty XML report. This should result in an exception because none of the columns needed by appear in the XML.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Reports.Parser.AwReportTest.getRowsTest
member.summary: Tests getting all 4 rows of the report. Makes sure that only 4 objects are returned representing the 4 rows. After this operation all of the rows will have been enumerated, so GetCurrentRow should always return the same last row.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Reports.Parser.AwReportTest.getCurrentRowTest
member.summary: Manually walks through the report row by row using MoveNext. There are only 4 rows, but this test moves next row more times than that and makes sure the currentRow stays on the final row.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Reports.Parser.AwReportTest.getCurrentRowBeforeMoveNextTest
member.summary: Tests to make sure an exception is thrown when the current row is requested before moving onto the first row by first calling MoveNext.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Reports.Parser.InputReaderTest.testXmlRead
member.summary: A test for the class. Tests that the reader can be advanced to the next row 4 times as there are only 4 rows in the sample xml.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Reports.Parser.InputReaderTest.testXmlGetAttributes
member.summary: Tests that the names and values of the columns in a row are retrieved properly.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Shopping.v201607.ProductPartitionTreeIntegrationTests.SubdivideShoes
member.summary:
Takes a tree with product type L1 "shoes" UNIT and subdivides that node into UNITs:
shoes new $1.00 refurbished $1.50 other - excluded

members.member:
Subdivides the new shoes.
Takes a tree with:
ROOT ... shoes new some bid
and changes it to:
ROOT ... shoes new other offerId $1.00 offerId=2 $2.00 ... offerId=20 $20.00

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Shopping.v201607.ProductPartitionTreeIntegrationTests.CollapseNewShoes
member.summary:
Takes a tree with:
ROOT ... shoes new offerId=1 $1.00 offerId=2 $2.00 ... offerId=20 $20.00 other - excluded
and changes it to:
ROOT ... shoes new $1.25 other $0.50

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Shopping.v201705.ProductPartitionTreeIntegrationTests.RebuildComplexTree
member.summary:
Creates a tree of the form:
ROOT ProductType Level1 shoes ProductType Level2 athletic shoes Condition new $2.50 Condition used $1.00 Other - exclude from bidding ProductType Level2 walking shoes Condition new $3.50 Condition used $1.25 Other $1.00 ProductType Level2 null (everything else) - exclude from bidding ProductType Level1 clothing ProductType Level2 winter clothing Condition new $1.00 Condition used $1.25 Other $1.50 ProductType Level2 summer clothing Condition new $1.10 Condition used $1.00 Other $1.25 ProductType Level2 null (everything else) Condition new $0.90 Condition used $0.85 Other $0.75 ProductType Level1 null (everything else) - exclude from bidding

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Shopping.v201705.ProductPartitionTreeIntegrationTests.SubdivideShoes
member.summary:
Takes a tree with product type L1 "shoes" UNIT and subdivides that node into UNITs:
shoes new $1.00 refurbished $1.50 other - excluded

members.member:
Subdivides the new shoes.
Takes a tree with:
ROOT ... shoes new some bid
and changes it to:
ROOT ... shoes new other offerId $1.00 offerId=2 $2.00 ... offerId=20 $20.00

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Tests.Util.Shopping.v201705.ProductPartitionTreeIntegrationTests.CollapseNewShoes
member.summary:
Takes a tree with:
ROOT ... shoes new offerId=1 $1.00 offerId=2 $2.00 ... offerId=20 $20.00 other - excluded
and changes it to:
ROOT ... shoes new $1.25 other $0.50
